project_name: Survey Management System - Risk Management Analysis
analyst_persona: Senior Level Director of Enterprise Management & Controlling (Risk)

executive_summary.risk_assessment: Current survey management presents HIGH operational risk with significant compliance vulnerabilities
executive_summary.business_justification: Centralized system essential for regulatory compliance and risk mitigation
executive_summary.strategic_recommendation: Proceed with implementation focusing on core security and compliance controls

critical_stakeholders.engagement_strategy: Early engagement on risk assessment framework
Mandatory approval for data processing activities

phase_1_stakeholder_matrix.risk_governance_framework: Risk Committee oversight with quarterly reviews

phase_2_problem_statement.business_pain: Fragmented survey operations without standardized risk controls creating compliance exposure
phase_2_problem_statement.change_motivation: Mitigate operational risk, ensure regulatory compliance, and protect bank reputation
primary_risk_drivers: Ad-hoc survey creation without risk controls
Manual processes prone to human error

scope_in_critical: Complete audit trail logging and regulatory reporting
GDPR compliance features and data encryption
Response validation and fraud detection controls
scope_out_risk_based: Survey response analysis tools (not core to risk management)
CRM system integration (additional data flow complexity)
critical_constraints: Must comply with all banking regulations and GDPR
Must meet bank's information security standards
Survey data must remain within approved geographic boundaries

risk_exposures.impact: Potential regulatory fines up to 4% of annual turnover

current_vulnerabilities: No systematic data classification for survey content
Inconsistent GDPR compliance across survey instances
Single points of failure with manual processes
Incomplete audit trails preventing compliance demonstration
Inconsistent security controls across survey platforms
compliance_gaps: GDPR Article 32 (Security of Processing) - Inadequate technical measures
Banking Regulations - Insufficient operational risk controls
Internal Audit - Lack of comprehensive audit trails
immediate_risk_mitigation: Complete inventory of all active survey instances
Conduct formal risk assessment for each survey
Establish incident response procedures for survey issues

risk_management_recommendations.implementation_approach: Risk-first implementation with security controls built from foundation
risk_management_recommendations.governance_structure: Risk Committee oversight with quarterly reviews and monthly security assessments
risk_management_recommendations.compliance_validation: Parallel compliance review at each development milestone
risk_management_recommendations.security_requirements: Mandatory security testing gates with no bypass authority
risk_management_recommendations.business_continuity: Phased rollout with rollback capability and disaster recovery procedures

next_steps.immediate: Establish project Risk Committee and security requirements documentation
next_steps.short_term: Begin security architecture design and compliance framework development
next_steps.medium_term: Implement core risk controls and conduct penetration testing
next_steps.long_term: Full deployment with comprehensive monitoring and continuous compliance validation
